title: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not being displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
OB: When opening the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values of the report parameters are not shown.
EB: The default values of the report parameters should be displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and check if the default values are shown for each parameter.
